trans-unit.source: Translates (moves) an object in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)] x-y coordinate system.
trans-unit.target: 會轉譯 （移動） 物件[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)]x，y 座標系統。

trans-unit.source: TranslateTransform defines an axis-aligned translation along the x- and y- axes.
trans-unit.target: Translatetransform 的定義的座標軸對齊翻譯沿著 x 軸和 y 軸。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows the transformation matrix for a translation by offset (*dx*, *dy*).
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示轉譯的轉換矩陣的位移 (*dx*， *dy*)。

trans-unit.source: ![Translate Matrix 100010dxdy1](~/add/media/translate-matrix.gif "Translate Matrix 100010dxdy1") Typical 3x3 matrix for 2-D translations **Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, the TranslateTransform class provides several special features: TranslateTransform objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: ![轉譯矩陣 100010dxdy1](~/add/media/translate-matrix.gif "轉譯矩陣 100010dxdy1") 2d 轉譯的一般 3x3 矩陣**可凍結的功能︰**因為它繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>類別 translatetransform 的類別提供數個特殊功能︰ translatetransform 的物件可以宣告為多個物件之間共用，變成唯讀，以改善效能、 複製，而進行安全執行緒。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關所提供的不同功能<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TranslateTransform"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TranslateTransform"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TranslateTransform"></xref> class and specifies the displacements in the direction of the x- and y- axes.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TranslateTransform"></xref>類別，並指定替代的 x 軸和 y 軸的方向。

trans-unit.source: The displacement in the direction of the x-axis.
trans-unit.target: 在 x 軸的方向移動。

trans-unit.source: The displacement in the direction of the y-axis.
trans-unit.target: Y 軸的方向移動。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable copy of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TranslateTransform"></xref> by making deep copies of its values.
trans-unit.target: 建立的可修改的複本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TranslateTransform"></xref>藉由其值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to produce modifiable copies of read-only <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來產生可修改複本的唯讀<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: When this method copies dependency properties, it copies resource references and data bindings, although they might no longer resolve.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法會複製相依性屬性時，它會複製資源參考和資料繫結，但可能已不再解析。

trans-unit.source: It does not copy animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 它不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable deep copy of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改深層複本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the cloned object returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the source is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: <> </> *> 複製物件的屬性會傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使<> *> 的來源屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable copy of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TranslateTransform"></xref> object by making deep copies of its values.
trans-unit.target: 建立的可修改的複本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TranslateTransform"></xref>物件藉由其值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: This method does not copy resource references, data bindings, and animations, although it does copy their current values.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會複製資源參考、 資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to produce modifiable copies of read-only <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來產生可修改複本的唯讀<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable deep copy of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改深層複本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the cloned object is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the source is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <> </> *> 複製物件的屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使<> *> 的來源屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref> representation of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TranslateTransform"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref>表示法<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TranslateTransform"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A matrix that represents this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TranslateTransform"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示這個矩陣<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TranslateTransform"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance to translate along the x-axis.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定沿著 x 軸平移的距離。

trans-unit.source: Negative values move an object to the left; positive values move an object to the right.
trans-unit.target: 負數值將物件移到左邊;正值會將物件向右移。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The distance to translate (move) an object along the x-axis.
trans-unit.target: 平移的距離 （移動） 物件沿著 x 軸。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TranslateTransform.X*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.TranslateTransform.X*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TranslateTransform.X*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance to translate (move) an object along the y-axis.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定物件沿著 y 軸平移 （移動） 的距離。

trans-unit.source: Negative values move an object up; positive values move an object down.
trans-unit.target: 負數值; 向上移動的物件正值會將物件向下移。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The distance to translate (move) an object along the y-axis.
trans-unit.target: 平移的距離 （移動） 物件沿著 y 軸。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TranslateTransform.Y*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.TranslateTransform.Y*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TranslateTransform.Y*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
